data.text: Let's nurture tolerance & respect for diversity - values which bring people together & make us all stronger. More on Friday's #ToleranceDay: https://t.co/HU1ZOW3ZEO https://t.co/p9bVg2xyvQ
Gaza: Overwhelmed medical facilities struggle to meet patients' basic needs, a situation made worse by escalation in fighting in the region. Listen to our in-depth report: https://t.co/eTdfvJVqqn
Inclusion and respect towards all people are essential for a more peaceful 🌍. Friday is #ToleranceDay: https://t.co/HU1ZOW3ZEO https://t.co/9UmdSaadqZ
Attacks on journalists are attacks on freedom of expression. @UNESCO works to end impunity for crimes against journalists: https://t.co/awbqioxPpM https://t.co/fJwaA7ZLfT
Philosophy creates intellectual conditions for peace and the achievement of the #GlobalGoals. Thursday is World #PhilosophyDay: https://t.co/VBYDTiSskH https://t.co/Wf5xEHcApK

Recycle ♻️
Save water 💧
Bike, walk & take public transport 🚲🚶‍♀️🚎🚶🏼🚇

#ClimateAction starts with you! Be part of the solution & get more ideas here: https://t.co/ZA3k0aVvHj https://t.co/aUcWLPbC1Y

Thank you @Twitter for activating the #StandUp4HumanRights emoji ahead of #HumanRightsDay on 10 December! Here's how you can "Shine Your Light" for human rights: https://t.co/kVfBIjevvn https://t.co/v9O3Nh4PRg

Do you have a favourite philosopher?

Thursday's #PhilosophyDay is an opportunity to highlight the importance of critical thinking to find new ways of living together & building fairer societies. More from @UNESCO: https://t.co/QEYmyUwfvm https://t.co/0Rz5dRCEDI
.#Olympics news: UN and @Tokyo2020 sign agreement to highlight important contribution sport makes to #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/RBaEIMqkO3

#UNBiodiversityConference calls on decision makers from 190+ countries to halt biodiversity loss & protect ecosystems that support billions of people: https://t.co/ZTaK1Xiokd #COP14 https://t.co/YPCOBQLHTp

Exercise🏃‍♀️🚴⛹️‍♀️
Eat healthy🍎🥦🥕
Avoid tobacco use🚭

It's possible to prevent or delay type 2 diabetes. Learn more on #WorldDiabetesDay here: https://t.co/I6788e6hIG https://t.co/ybpPG21IYv

"We are adapting the UN to the reality around us" 
-- UN Special Advisor on Reform @JensWandel on UN reforms now underway. Watch ➡️ https://t.co/AkW7QEgz1i

Greater internet access for women & girls can boost new skills & provide leadership opportunities. The Internet Governance Forum discusses how: https://t.co/5w6llCxWld  #IGF2018 https://t.co/j5HqS10p6l

More than 420 million people live with diabetes worldwide.

On Wednesday's #WorldDiabetesDay, see how @WHO works to improve access & quality care for diabetics: https://t.co/IG7z4xYdqB https://t.co/3EdR70ISpk
Education can help prevent diabetes. Get the facts from @WHO on Wednesday's #WorldDiabetesDay: https://t.co/I6788e6hIG #GlobalGoals https://t.co/EI73BoDBA3
Gaza: @antonioguterres "urges all parties to exercise maximum restraint" following surge in violence: https://t.co/Tfvqg7Nm16

Last year, the world suffered US $320 billion in economic losses due to extreme weather. On Tuesday, @UNECOSOC discusses climate resilience for small islands: https://t.co/FcdYA10YKf #ClimateAction https://t.co/zZFQxwLnX3

Read the inspiring story of Akhilesh, one of 20 openly gay students who won a ruling from India’s Supreme Court striking down laws criminalizing homosexuality: https://t.co/KJI8zHvaEM via @UNHumanRights #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/wrmXi8CI5h
.@UNECOSOC examines link between climate change and peace in Africa’s Sahel region, one of the world’s poorest & most vulnerable areas: https://t.co/Rt8hn0BwEL #ClimateAction https://t.co/QEV0XSguFA

1 mobile, 1 minute and 1 film to #StandUp4HumanRights

A @MobileFilmFest finalist from India explores the problem of access to education through a heart-wrenching interaction between 2 kids from different worlds. https://t.co/JIxUTqvlZU

The Global Compact #ForMigration is a historic opportunity to improve international cooperation on safe, orderly & regular migration - to benefit everyone. https://t.co/1jKetKa2C9 https://t.co/lXjESmHKwd

Inspired by true stories of child labourers, a powerful immersive street art exhibit organized by @franceonu & @SamExhibition opens Monday at UNHQ in NYC ⬇️ #UNji 

https://t.co/ziFJgUyFKo

"When it comes to governance, we must be as creative & bold as those who first built the Internet. You can count on my support in this journey towards a prosperous, safe & fair digital future." -- @antonioguterres to global leaders at #IGF2018 https://t.co/UKTLQI7aAM https://t.co/gBMiYaUVpA

Smiles all round when women peacekeepers from Zambia who are #ServingForPeace with @UN_CAR patrol the streets of Birao town, in Central African Republic. https://t.co/sqplGqlUVB https://t.co/oUVIZ5CPMc

Starts on Wednesday in Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt: @UNBiodiversity Conference lay groundwork for action to protect biodiversity & nature for coming decades. https://t.co/WIawQ6GLKP #COP14 https://t.co/OiONpHkvfT
Starts on Monday in Paris @UNESCO: Internet Governance Forum with @antonioguterres & more (through 14 Nov). Details: https://t.co/zY4Y8iH4UU #IGF2018 https://t.co/RniE0taiFE

"The horror of the great global conflicts cannot be forgotten...But horror must never prevail over hope." @antonioguterres at Sunday's #ParisPeaceForum: https://t.co/1q0IdFMxZ2 #Armistice100 https://t.co/avi94CqpSL
Monday is the last day of Int'l Week of Science & Peace! Progress in science can mean progress for peace & #GlobalGoals https://t.co/TBIsJDELam https://t.co/SPBQmV0BTm
The production of meat for human consumption is one of the most destructive ways people are harming the planet. More from @UNEnvironment ➡️ https://t.co/nvx9GvvHKf #GlobalGoals

It's World Antibiotic Awareness Week!

ALWAYS seek the advice of a qualified healthcare professional before taking antibiotics. 💊 Help stop the spread of #AntibioticResistance: https://t.co/ulf74OjIlm https://t.co/lhMGsj0n2g

Five years ago, one of the strongest tropical cyclones ever recorded, Typhoon Haiyan, devastated parts of the Philippines. Watch how the UN's rapid response teams were #ReadyToGo when needed ⬇️ https://t.co/yh14U6UN5m

“I will not sit back and watch an assault on multilateralism just when it is most needed.” -@antonioguterres at Sunday’s #ParisPeaceForum ⬇️
https://t.co/EGy6JZhNr8 https://t.co/T9LxScqf1F

The Intl Court of Justice works to settle legal disputes between countries & gives advisory opinions in accordance with intl law. Get details about @CIJ_ICJ here: https://t.co/0F9o3dPDbn https://t.co/yXaj3ynzJH

"How come the most intellectual creature to ever walk Earth is destroying its only home?" -- @JaneGoodallInst. Read more from our UN Messenger of Peace: https://t.co/vaot6FHwoC #ClimateAction https://t.co/z1Ld861Ubp
Sustainable consumption and production ensures a better quality of life for all. Get more info here: https://t.co/dFLyw9bC5q  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/8Gfnspbann

See how you can "shine your light" and #StandUpForHumanRights ahead of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights 70th anniversary: https://t.co/ST9Dxmbj96 https://t.co/j3yLH8VL7o

Chloe, the UN Therapy Dog, helps staff members at UNHQ in NYC. Animal-assisted therapy supports #GlobalGoal 3 which aims to achieve health and well-being for all. https://t.co/B7UHFsd3GI https://t.co/Dijd6PXaMS

Knowledge helps people create solutions for a better life. Find out more from @UNESCO on Saturday's 🌏 #ScienceDay for Peace & Development:

80% of children in Yemen are in need of humanitarian assistance. Food shortages, disease, displacement & lack of basic social services are of critical concern as fighting intensifies. https://t.co/JVVswg7TaM via @unicef
Everyone has the right to enjoy the benefits of scientific progress. Find out more on Saturday's 🌏 Science Day for Peace & Development: https://t.co/emWoF3snSb https://t.co/diDXtEBB9n
Frontline health workers in Uganda are receiving vaccines from @WHO to protect them against the Ebola virus circulating in neighbouring Democratic Republic of Congo: https://t.co/05UGB6hBLx

New @UNPOL photo exhibit opened at UNHQ in NYC, featuring striking images from @UNPeacekeeping missions by photographer @NerrisM. Find out what inspired him: https://t.co/RPjojAjARx https://t.co/3aE9pV9V4G

Science, tech & innovation provide 🔑 answers to achieve the #GlobalGoals.

Saturday is 🌏 Science Day for Peace & Development: https://t.co/emWoF3aN0D https://t.co/8ltM5eSopN

"Anti-Semitism is back and it needs to be fought as the crime it is." -@antonioguterres, meeting Holocaust survivor Norbert Strauss on 80th anniversary of Nazi Kristallnacht attack on Jewish people in Germany. https://t.co/rHg9p65Gmz #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/Va8xhajwHs

Free, independent and pluralistic media has never been so important. Standing up for #PressFreedom is standing up for democracy. ℹ️ https://t.co/uADdUKNZEL via @UNESCO #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/0BqxEe2Jh3

The multilateral arrangements we know today have a proven track record in saving lives, generating economic & social progress and avoiding a 3rd descent into world war -- @antonioguterres tells Security Council https://t.co/oWNlCS0nw5 https://t.co/HAwxNwrmk8

Security Council meets on role of UN in strengthening multilateralism. Watch now: https://t.co/13sSLjsGKG

The number of refugees & migrants from Venezuela has reached 3 million worldwide. @Refugees is working to feed, shelter & support the most vulnerable women, children and men on the move. https://t.co/N3yjGZYaeI #WithRefugees
UN reform means more opportunities to better-serve the world, and dozens of exciting new job openings. Application details are here https://t.co/Zvy9dzjAnS https://t.co/Dwsy531mBz
Join a UN Humanitarian Air Service flight into Libya! @WFP manages a fleet of  90+ aircraft that deliver humanitarian cargo to vulnerable people around the world. Watch ⬇️ https://t.co/EKtaibyHR8
The “Knotted Gun” at UNHQ - a gift from @LuxembourgUN - is a universal symbol of non-violence. More on the iconic sculpture: https://t.co/N2zU9unINv https://t.co/cEWehWaIsE

Xenophobia
Intolerance
